basic.name: Healing Brew (Q)
basic.description: Throw a cup of tea that heals the lowest Health ally within range for a moderate amount. {highlight}Marks healed allies with cups. After an allied hero receives 3 cups, Li Li can collect them, granting that hero the same effects of Fast Feet, including those from talents.{/highlight}

basic.name: Cloud Serpent (W)
basic.description: Summon a Cloud Serpent on an allied Hero that automatically attacks nearby enemies, doing minor damage. Lasts for 8 seconds.

basic.name: Blinding Wind (E)
basic.description: Throw a cloud of wind at the 2 nearest enemies (prioritizing Heroes), dealing moderate damage. Affected enemies are blinded for 1.5 seconds, causing their Basic Attacks to miss and deal no damage.
passives: {highlight}Passive: Li Li gains 6 mana by hitting blinded targets.{/highlight}

heroic.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups (R)
heroic.description: Channel for up to 6 seconds, healing the lowest Health nearby allied Hero every 0.25 seconds.

heroic.name: Water Dragon (R)
heroic.description: Summon a Water Dragon that after a short delay hits an enemy Hero and all enemies near them, dealing significant damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

trait.name: Fast Feet (Trait)
trait.description: Upon taking damage, your Basic Ability cooldowns refresh {highlight}50%{/highlight} faster and you gain 10% Movement Speed for 1 second.

1.name: Safety Sprint
1.description: Activate to gain Fast Feet, 30 Armor, and 30% Movement Speed for {highlight}1.5{/highlight} seconds.
passives: While Fast Feet is active, Li Li gains 10 Armor.

1.name: Fur-ocious Serpent
1.description: {highlight}Fast Feet increases self and Cloud Serpent's attack speed by 25%{/highlight}

4.name: Two for One
4.description: Healing brew now heals an additional target{highlight} being the closest hero to Li Li{/highlight}

4.name: Healing Vapors
4.description: {highlight}Healing brew now heals an area around the hero by 50% applying cups to everyone{/highlight}

4.name: Five O'Clock
4.description: {highlight}Tea Table (Active|Toggle): The next Healing Brew heals all heroes within range (18 seconds){/highlight}

7.name: The Good Stuff
7.description: Healing Brew heals for an additional 42 over 3 seconds. While Fast Feet is active, this heal amount is increased by 100%.

7.name: Mass Vortex
7.description: {highlight}Every Time Li Li hit all Blinding Wind Targets makes her next cast hit one more target also increasing Li Li spell power by 10% each stack for 4 seconds, not hitting all targets reset the bonus{/highlight}

7.name: Don't Stop, We Need Adventure!
7.description: {highlight}Cloud Serpent now cleanses roots, silence, stuns and silence on cast and expire{/highlight}
passives: {highlight}Fast feet increase cloud serpent refresh rate an additional 50%{/highlight}

10.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
10.description: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50 additional seconds, and heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 75 Health.

10.name: Water Dragon
10.description: Cooldown: 50 secondsLi Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Gale Force
13.description: {highlight}Li Li basic attacks againt blinded heroes increases the blind duration by 0.25 and bounces to the closest hero if the hero is also blinded the attack bounces again.{/highlight}

13.name: Lightning Serpent
13.description: Cloud Serpent attacks bounce to hit 2 additional targets for 13 (+4% per level) damage and 10 (+4% per level) healing

13.name: Hindering Winds
13.description: Increase Blinding Wind's Slow amount to 30% and its duration to 2 seconds.

16.name: Shake It Off
16.description: Gain 35 Armor while Stunned, Silenced, or Rooted.
passives: {highlight}Passive: Fast feet increases Li Li health regeneration by 400%{/highlight}

16.name: Pick Me Up
16.description: Healing Brew's healing for Heroes is increased by 33% if they are under 50% Health.

16.name: Blessings of Yu'lon
16.description: Cloud Serpent grants its bearer 10% increased healing received and heals them for an additional 0.5% of their maximum Health each time it attacks.

20.name: Jug of 1,000,000 Cups
20.description: Jug of 1,000 Cups heals two allies at a time.

20.name: Double Dragon
20.description: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another Water Dragon is summoned at the point of impact.

20.name: Mistweaver
20.description: Cooldown: 30 secondsActive:  Activate to heal nearby allied Heroes for 149. Basic Attacks and Cloud Serpent attacks reduce the cooldown of Mistweaver by 1 second.

20.name: Tea Bagging
20.description: {highlight}Decrease the cups needed for Li Li to collect to 2{/highlight}
